languages.text: "Проклятье! Они все еще могут говорить! Они помнят тех, кто сотворил с ними все это!" {n}Хейнрикс сжимает кулаки в бессильном гневе. Затем кривится.{/n} "Возможно, небольшое воздействие биомантией позволит вытащить из них крупицы знаний. Или спровоцирует дальнейший процесс".

"I'll be damned! They can still speak! They remember the people who did this to them!" {n}Heinrix balls his fists in powerless rage. Then he frowns in thought.{/n} "Perhaps a little biomancy will allow us to draw the fragments of knowledge out of them. Or it will trigger further... changes."
languages.original_text: "Проклятье! Они все еще могут говорить! Они помнят тех, кто сотворил с ними все это!" {n}Хейнрикс сжимает кулаки в бессильном гневе. Затем кривится.{/n} "Возможно, небольшое воздействие биомантией позволит вытащить из них крупицы знаний. Или спровоцирует дальнейший процесс".

traits.locale_text: "I'll be damned! They can still speak! They remember the people who did this to them!" {n}Heinrix balls his fists in powerless rage. Then he frowns in thought.{/n} "Perhaps a little biomancy will allow us to draw the fragments of knowledge out of them. Or it will trigger further... changes."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

Then he frowns in thought.{/n} "Perhaps a little biomancy will allow us to draw the fragments of knowledge out of them. Or it will trigger further... changes."

Then he frowns in thought.{/n} "Perhaps a little biomancy will allow us to draw the fragments of knowledge out of them. Or it will trigger further... changes."

traits.locale_text: "I'll be damned! They can still speak! They remember the people who did this to them!" {n}Heinrix balls his fists in powerless rage. Then he frowns in thought.{/n} "Perhaps a little biomancy will allow us to draw the fragments of knowledge out of them. Or it will trigger further... changes."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “真是该死！他们还能说话！他们还能记得是谁对他们做了这样的事情！”{n}海因里希捏紧了拳头，无力地愤怒着。之后他皱起了眉头，思考起来。{/n}“或许我可以施展小小的生物法术，从他们身上提取出知识的碎片。但这可能会引起进一步的……变化。”
languages.original_text: "I'll be damned! They can still speak! They remember the people who did this to them!" {n}Heinrix balls his fists in powerless rage. Then he frowns in thought.{/n} "Perhaps a little biomancy will allow us to draw the fragments of knowledge out of them. Or it will trigger further... changes."

traits.locale_text: “真是该死！他们还能说话！他们还能记得是谁对他们做了这样的事情！”{n}海因里希捏紧了拳头，无力地愤怒着。之后他皱起了眉头，思考起来。{/n}“或许我可以施展小小的生物法术，从他们身上提取出知识的碎片。但这可能会引起进一步的……变化。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¡Por el Trono! ¡Todavía pueden hablar! ¡Recuerdan quién les ha hecho esto!». {n}Heinrix aprieta los puños, presa de una ira impotente. Después frunce el ceño mientras piensa.{/n} «Tal vez con un poco de biomancia pueda extraer algún retazo de conocimiento. O tal vez desencadene más... cambios».
languages.original_text: "I'll be damned! They can still speak! They remember the people who did this to them!" {n}Heinrix balls his fists in powerless rage. Then he frowns in thought.{/n} "Perhaps a little biomancy will allow us to draw the fragments of knowledge out of them. Or it will trigger further... changes."

traits.locale_text: «¡Por el Trono! ¡Todavía pueden hablar! ¡Recuerdan quién les ha hecho esto!». {n}Heinrix aprieta los puños, presa de una ira impotente. Después frunce el ceño mientras piensa.{/n} «Tal vez con un poco de biomancia pueda extraer algún retazo de conocimiento. O tal vez desencadene más... cambios».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「クソっ！彼らはまだ話すことができる！こんなことをした奴らを覚えているんだ！」{n}ハインリックスは無力な怒りに拳を握る。そして考え込んみ、顔をしかめた。{/n}「おそらく、生体秘法を使うことで、知識の断片を引き出せるかもしれません。あるいは…さらなる変化の引き金になるかもしれませんが」
languages.original_text: "I'll be damned! They can still speak! They remember the people who did this to them!" {n}Heinrix balls his fists in powerless rage. Then he frowns in thought.{/n} "Perhaps a little biomancy will allow us to draw the fragments of knowledge out of them. Or it will trigger further... changes."

traits.locale_text: 「クソっ！彼らはまだ話すことができる！こんなことをした奴らを覚えているんだ！」{n}ハインリックスは無力な怒りに拳を握る。そして考え込んみ、顔をしかめた。{/n}「おそらく、生体秘法を使うことで、知識の断片を引き出せるかもしれません。あるいは…さらなる変化の引き金になるかもしれませんが」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich will verdammt sein! Sie können noch sprechen! Sie erinnern sich an die Personen, die ihnen das angetan haben!" {n}Heinrix ballt in machtlosem Zorn die Fäuste. Dann verzieht er nachdenklich das Gesicht.{/n} "Vielleicht könnten wir mit etwas Biomantie die Wissensfragmente aus ihnen herausholen. Oder wir lösen dadurch weitere ... Veränderungen aus."
languages.original_text: "I'll be damned! They can still speak! They remember the people who did this to them!" {n}Heinrix balls his fists in powerless rage. Then he frowns in thought.{/n} "Perhaps a little biomancy will allow us to draw the fragments of knowledge out of them. Or it will trigger further... changes."

traits.locale_text: "Ich will verdammt sein! Sie können noch sprechen! Sie erinnern sich an die Personen, die ihnen das angetan haben!" {n}Heinrix ballt in machtlosem Zorn die Fäuste. Dann verzieht er nachdenklich das Gesicht.{/n} "Vielleicht könnten wir mit etwas Biomantie die Wissensfragmente aus ihnen herausholen. Oder wir lösen dadurch weitere ... Veränderungen aus."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Incroyable ! Non seulement ils peuvent toujours parler, mais en plus, ils se souviennent de ceux qui leur ont fait cela ! » {n}Les poings serrés de rage impuissante, Heinrix se met à réfléchir en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} « Nous réussirons peut-être à obtenir des fragments d'informations grâce à la biomancie. Ou alors, cela déclenchera d'autres... changements. »
languages.original_text: "I'll be damned! They can still speak! They remember the people who did this to them!" {n}Heinrix balls his fists in powerless rage. Then he frowns in thought.{/n} "Perhaps a little biomancy will allow us to draw the fragments of knowledge out of them. Or it will trigger further... changes."

traits.locale_text: « Incroyable ! Non seulement ils peuvent toujours parler, mais en plus, ils se souviennent de ceux qui leur ont fait cela ! » {n}Les poings serrés de rage impuissante, Heinrix se met à réfléchir en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} « Nous réussirons peut-être à obtenir des fragments d'informations grâce à la biomancie. Ou alors, cela déclenchera d'autres... changements. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Şu işe bak! Hâlâ konuşabiliyor! Bunu yapanları hatırlıyor!" {n}Heinrix, boş bir öfkeyle yumruklarını sıkıyor. Sonra kaşlarını çatıp düşüncelere dalıyor.{/n} "Belki biraz biyobazlık ile bildiklerini öğrenebiliriz. Gerçi daha da büyük değişiklikler... Tetiklenebilir."
languages.original_text: "I'll be damned! They can still speak! They remember the people who did this to them!" {n}Heinrix balls his fists in powerless rage. Then he frowns in thought.{/n} "Perhaps a little biomancy will allow us to draw the fragments of knowledge out of them. Or it will trigger further... changes."

traits.locale_text: “Şu işe bak! Hâlâ konuşabiliyor! Bunu kendine yapanları hatırlıyor!” {n}Heinrix, boş bir öfkeyle yumruklarını sıkıyor. Sonra kaşlarını çatıp düşüncelere dalıyor.{/n} “Belki biraz biyobüyüyle bildiklerini öğrenebiliriz. Gerçi daha da büyük değişiklikler... tetiklenebilir.”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
